plot: Harriet's car drops dead on her cross-country trip home from her college graduation. She mourns it by remembering her favorite moments with it while trying not to face the closing of this chapter in her life.
title: Marley
plot_es: Harriet's car drops dead on her cross-country trip home from her college graduation. She mourns it by remembering her favorite moments with it while trying not to face the closing of this chapter in her life.
